name: Retrace (DeadPie, MCMGameStudio)
description:
-----Description-----

You've reached the end of a dungeon and right as you collect its sacred artifact, the Transplacer, you're locked inside. Escape the dungeon with the help of the Transplacer and clever thinking.

Turning Speed can be altered only from the Pause Menu's Settings

-----Controls-----

Movement - WASD or arrow keys

Shooting - Left mouse or left ctrl

Looking around - Mouse

Pause - P

-----Jam Info-----

This game was made for Hiddel's NES Game Jam, with the theme of "Reverse". The theme was incorporated by having you bullets shoot towards you instead of away, and having you make your way out of a dungeon, instead of going in.
All art, sound effects, music and code was made during the Jam.

-----Credits-----

  • Coding & Art - DeadPieGamer
  • Music - TinyGod
  • SFX - playfuldoggo
